name: AG Prime
description:
We are a dutch-romanian company, active in Europe, USA and the middle-east. We have dedicated Project managers for each project. We have expertise in Web development and Mobile application development for over 6 years.
We have great experience deploying with Drupal starting from version 5. We have teams mixed with Backend and Frontend people. Each team is managed in an agile way and consists of Quality Assurance and Project managers.
Our projects range from simple presentation sites, e-commerce shop to custom web applications and social networks. Our current clients database comes from US, Europe and middle-East, giving us expertise working with different cultures and timezones.Â We are located in western Romania, 2 hours flight from any corner of Europe, with international airport and direct flights with London, Paris, Madrid, Eindhoven, Dubai and more.
